actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to provide for the duty-free entry of articles required for the installation and operation of a telescope in Arizona.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to admit free of duty any articles determined to be required for the installation and operation of a certain telescope in Arizona.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the duty-free entry of articles required for the installation and operation of a telescope in Arizona.
